name: ScoreboardsHelper
description: The ScoreboardsHelper class provides a comprehensive interface for interacting with Minecraft's scoreboard system in JsMacros scripts.
overview:
The `ScoreboardsHelper` class provides a comprehensive interface for interacting with Minecraft's scoreboard system in JsMacros scripts. This class serves as the main entry point for accessing scoreboard objectives, teams, player team information, and display slots. It's particularly useful for scripts that need to monitor scoreboards, track team information, or work with competitive multiplayer features.

This class extends `BaseHelper<Scoreboard>` and wraps Minecraft's internal `Scoreboard` functionality, making it accessible to GraalJS scripts. It acts as a gateway to both scoreboard objectives and team management functionality.

methods.name: getObjectiveForTeamColorIndex
methods.description: Returns the scoreboard objective displayed in the slot corresponding to the specified team color index. This is primarily used for team-colored sidebars in competitive modes.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The team color index (0-based). Must be >= 0.

methods.name: getObjectiveSlot
methods.description: Returns the scoreboard objective displayed in the specified display slot. Different slots show scoreboards in different locations (tab list, sidebar, below name).

parameters.name: slot
parameters.description: The display slot number. Valid values: 0 (Tab list), 1 (Sidebar), 2 (Below name), 3-18 (Team-colored sidebars).

methods.name: getPlayerTeamColorIndex
methods.description: Returns the team color index for the specified player entity.

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: The player entity to get the team color index for.

methods.name: getPlayerTeamColorIndex
methods.description: Returns the team color index for the client player.

methods.name: getTeamColorFormatting
methods.description: Returns the formatting code for the client player's team color.

methods.name: getTeamColorFormatting
methods.description: Returns the formatting code for the specified player's team color.

parameters.name: player
parameters.description: The player to get the team color formatting for.

methods.name: getTeamColor
methods.description: Returns the color value of the client player's team.

methods.name: getTeamColor
methods.description: Returns the color value of the specified player's team.

parameters.name: player
parameters.description: The player to get the team color for.

methods.name: getTeamColorName
methods.description: Returns the name of the client player's team color.

methods.name: getTeamColorName
methods.description: Returns the name of the specified player's team color.

parameters.name: player
parameters.description: The player to get the team color name for.

methods.name: getTeams
methods.description: Returns a list of all teams currently registered in the scoreboard system.

methods.name: getPlayerTeam
methods.description: Returns the team for the client player.

methods.name: getPlayerTeam
methods.description: Returns the team for the specified player.

parameters.name: p
parameters.description: The player to get the team for.

methods.name: getCurrentScoreboard
methods.description: Returns the scoreboard objective that is currently displayed on the sidebar. This method intelligently selects between team-colored objectives and the main sidebar objective based on the client player's team.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the ScoreboardsHelper, including information about the current scoreboard.
